Heap.Definition: A heap is a data structure that efficiently supports priority queue operations insert and find/delete-min
Heap.Structure: The first index stores the root, index 2 stores the left hand child, 3 stores the right, etc.
Heap.min-heap: The minimum element is on top
Heap.max-heap: The maximum element is on top

Quick sort.Randomized quick sort: Same algorithm as quick sort but it shuffles the inputs before hand for security reasons (so that malicious people can't slow down your system)
